trans-unit.source: Specifies a custom class that extends the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> class for use by Web Part connections.
TransformerInfo objects specify custom classes that extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> class.
These custom transformer classes act as bridges between Web Parts, translating data between Web Parts with incompatible connection points.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> class with the specified name and type reference.
The configuration system does not validate the specified type to ensure that a valid type name is used.
The name of this transformer type.
A reference to a type that extends the transformer <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> class.
Compares the current <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object to another <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object.
The object to compare to the current object.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the passed object is equal to the current object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Generates a hash code for the collection.
Unique integer hash code for the current object.
Gets or sets a friendly name for a type that that extends the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> class.
A friendly name for a type that that extends the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the type reference for a class that extends the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> class.
The configuration system does not validate the specified type to ensure that a valid type name is used.
However, invalid types will cause exceptions when Web pages are loaded.
A type reference for a class that extends the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> class.
